long_description: Use the modular Light & Motion Solite 100 as a headlamp, flashlight, lantern or bike light to illuminate all your nighttime adventures. Modular design lets you attach the lighting unit to the battery pack for use as a flashlight or lantern, and then attach it to the included head strap for hands-free lighting. High-quality LED outputs 100 lumens on high to light up the darkest parts of the trail. Small LEDs on the sides of the light have red filters to maximize your visibility during activities at night. Lithium-ion rechargeable battery provides up to 100 hrs. of use on the lowest setting and 2 hrs. 30 min. on the highest setting; get up to 60 hrs. of use in flash mode. 4-stage battery life indicator keeps you posted on how much power you have left. Recharge the battery from any standard USB port using the included cable; it takes about 5 hrs. to fully charge the battery. Mount the Lite & Motion Solite 100 on your bike's handlebar (mount not included) to light up the street ahead and increase your visibility to oncoming motorists.
